data.name: Arm Breaka
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: Deals X physical damage. Removes 50 Action Points over 5 seconds.

data.name: 'Ave Another One
data.description: Follow 'me Lead will deal an additional X elemental damage over 5 seconds.

data.name: Big Brawlin'
data.description: Big Swing and Big Slash now deal elemental damage.

data.name: Big Slash
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: Deals X physical damage to targets 25 feet from you, and knocks them back.

data.name: Big Swing
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: Deals X physical damage to targets within 30 feet.

data.name: Bring 'Em On
data.description: Whenever you parry, you immediately put your "Best Plan" in motion.

data.name: Can't Hit Me!
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description: Increase block chance by 50%. While you are channeling, you can move at 60% movement speed. After you block, the attacker takes X physical damage.

data.name: Can't Touch Us
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description: Group members within 100 feet will gain 200 Action Points and will absorb up to 4500 damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: Challenge
data.description: You challenge all opponents in front of you, forcing monsters to attack you. While challenged, your opponents will deal only 70% damage to everyone other than you. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Champion's Challenge
data.description:
Both you and your target are held tightly in place for 10 seconds, and neither one of you can move.
This effect can not be dispelled or broken.

data.name: Changin' Da Plan
data.note: This ability does not trigger the GCD
data.description:
You suddenly realize that you could smash things better with a different plan.

No Plan: You gain Da Good Plan.
Da Good Plan: You gain Da Best Plan.
Da Best Plan: You gain Da Good Plan.

data.name: Clobber
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: Slashes for X physical damage, and generates extra hate against monsters.

data.name: Da Biggest!
data.note: Can only have 1 war bellow active.
data.description: A mighty war cry that weakens your foes and gives you their strengths. All your melee attacks gain a 25% chance to randomly steal a 75 ability bonus to stat points from targets within 30 feet of you for 10 seconds. During this time, both you and groupmates within 100 feet will benefit from the stolen stats.

data.name: Da Greenest
data.note: Can only have 1 war bellow active.
data.description: A Waaaghy bellow that raises resistances when hit. Incoming attacks have a 25% chance to give a X ability bonus to that type of damage for 10 seconds on all group members within 100 feet. Physical damage will give a Y ability bonus to Armor instead.

data.name: Da Toughest!
data.note: Can only have 1 war bellow active.
data.description: A grand war cry to proclaim yourself da toughest! All your attacks gain a 25% chance to cause your group to absorb X damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Deafening Bellow!
data.description: All targets within 30 feet of you take 1200 damage and are silenced, unable to use magic for 5 seconds.

data.name: Demolishing Strike
data.description: A powerful melee attack deals 900 damage over 15 seconds and cause the target to take a 1056 morale penalty to armor.

data.name: Distracting Bellow
data.description: A loud shout that startles your target and all enemies within 30 feet of them, reducing their damage to 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Don't Bother Me None
data.description: Gain a 252 unique bonus to spirit resistance.

data.name: Down Ya Go
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: Deals X physical damage and knocks target down for 3 seconds.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30% for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Offense
data.description: You deal 15% more damage and all enemy monsters will hate you 15% less than normal, but your armor is reduced by 33%.

data.name: Follow 'me Lead
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: Deals X elemental damage.

data.name: Get 'Em
data.description: An encouraging bellow that causes group members within 100 feet to regenerate action points 20% faster for 15 seconds.

data.name: Good Wif Shield
data.description: Increases block chance by 10%. Tuffer N' Nails now lasts 10 seconds. Ya Missed Me's cooldown is now 10 seconds.

data.name: Gork Smash!
data.description: Increases critical hit chance by 15% for 6 seconds after using a Da' Best Plan ability.

data.name: Guud at Big Choppin!
data.description: When you are wielding a greatweapon, your chance to parry is increased by 5% and all damage you deal is increased by 10%.

data.name: Hold The Line!
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description:
You focus your defenses against enemy fire, increasing your chances to dodge and disrupt by 45% for 12 seconds. You will also defend all allies behind you, up to 50 feet away, increasing their chances to dodge and disrupt by 15% as long as they remain at your back. Allies may have this effect stacked on them up to 3 times.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.

data.name: I'm Da Biggest!
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to Wounds.

data.name: Immaculate Defense
data.description: An impressive display of defense which reduces incoming damage by 75% for both you and all group members within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: Juggernaut
data.description: You become filled with unstoppable power, removing all snaring, rooting, silencing, and disarming effects.

data.name: Less Stabbin' Me
data.description: Increases block and parry by 8% for 6 seconds whenever you use a Da' Best Plan ability.

data.name: Lob Choppa
data.description: A basic throwing attack that inflicts X physical damage. Has a chance to deal Y physical damage to a severely wounded target if you are behind them.

data.name: Lookin' For Opp'tunity
data.description: Clobber now removes 6 percentage points from your opponents Morale.

data.name: Loudmouth
data.description: War Bellows (Da Biggest, Da Toughest, Da Greenest) now also deal X physical damage to the target that triggers them.

data.name: Menace
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 100% more than normal on all attacks.

data.name: No Shootin' Me
data.description: You will gain 15% dodge for 6s after using a da' Best Plan ability.

data.name: Not in da face!
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: Deals X physical damage. Increases cooldowns on target by 5 seconds for 10 seconds. Decreases the cooldowns of groupmates within 100 feet by 5 seconds for 10 seconds.

data.name: Puddle o Muck
data.description: Deals 1800 damage over 15 seconds to all targets 40 feet in front of you. Affected targets are snared by 40% for 15 seconds.

data.name: Quit Yer Squabblin'
data.description: Every member of your group within 100 feet gains an additional 10% chance to parry and dodge for 30 seconds.

data.name: Raze
data.description: Repeatedly attack all enemies in a line in front of you, inflicting 300 damage every second for 3 seconds, up to 65 feet away.

data.name: Right in Da Jibblies
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: Deals X physical damage. This ability cannot be blocked or parried.

data.name: Rock 'Ard
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: Activates protective shield that absorbs up to Y over 5 seconds for group mates within 80ft.

data.name: Rugged
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to toughness

data.name: Save Da Runts
data.note: Only usable on other players
data.description: You defend one of your groupmates and try to take attacks meant for them. As long as you are within 30 feet of them, any damage that they suffer and all hate that they cause will be split evenly between the two of you.

data.name: Savin' Me Hide
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: Deals X physical damage. Group members within 100 feet will take only 80% incoming magic damage for the next 4 seconds.

data.name: Shatter Enchantment
data.note: Target must have an Enchantment
data.description: A shattering attack that removes one Enchantment from your enemy and do X physical damage.

data.name: Shield Wall
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, your chance to block is almost guaranteed.

data.name: Shut Yer Face
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: Deals X physical damage. Silences target for 4 seconds.

data.name: Skull Thumper
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: A pounding blow to your opponent's skull that deals X physical damage. If the target is afflicted with Da Greenest, the target will be ailed and take additional Y elemental damage when Heaven's Blade procs scaling with weapon skill.

data.name: Stab You Gooder
data.description: All of your critical hits will deal 25% more bonus critical damage.

data.name: Taunt
data.description: You enrage your opponent, interrupting any currently building abilities and forcing monsters to attack you. While taunted your opponent will take 30% more damage from your attacks. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: T'ree Hit Combo
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: You swing your weapon lots, dealing X physical damage every 0.8 seconds for 3 seconds. As Da' Big Boss would say, "Countin' is for Stuntiez."

data.name: Trip 'Em Up
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: You "trip" your opponent by hacking at their legs for X physical damage, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Tuffer 'n Nails
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: Deals X physical damage. Gain a Y ability bonus to armor for 5 seconds.

data.name: Unstoppable Juggernaut
data.description: Juggernaut's cooldown is reduced to 20 seconds.

data.name: WAAAAAAAGH!
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: Deals X elemental damage to all targets within 30 feet. Causes enemies to take a X ability penalty to elemental resistance for 20 seconds. Groupmates within 100 feet of you will have their auto attack damage increased by 25% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Walk it off!
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet gains a 160 morale bonus to toughness for 30 seconds.

data.name: We'z Bigger
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: You proclaim your size to Mork, granting a X ability bonus to wounds and +5% block to groupmates within 100 feet for 20 seconds.

data.name: Where You Going?
data.description: You root four enemies within 30 feet of you, preventing them fom moving for 10 seconds. There is a 50% chance of the root breaking with every hit.

data.name: Wot armor?
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: Deals X physical damage. Causes the target to take a Y ability penalty to armor for 10 seconds.

data.name: Ya Missed Me
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: Deals X undefendable physical damage. Target's physical damage done is reduced to 80% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Yer Nothin
data.description: Deals 1800 damage over 12 seconds to all targets within 30 feet in of you. Affected targets lose 30 seconds of Morale over 12 seconds.

data.name: You Got Nuffin'
data.description: When War Bellows trigger they will now restore 270 health over 10 seconds to your group members within 100 feet of you.

data.name: You Wot?
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: You fly into a rage for 10 seconds gaining 100% increase auto attack speed, -100% ap cost, and will be under the effect of all 3 war bellows for 10 seconds. At the end of this, you will lose your war bellow , have -50% auto attack speed, and only move at 80% movement speed for 5 seconds.

data.name: Youz see me blok' dat'?!
data.description: Whenever you Block an attack you gain 4 percentage points worth of Morale. This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Youz see me blok' dat'?!
data.description: Right in Da Jibblies will now hit enemies within 25 feet in front of you, cost 10 more action points, and is no longer undefendable.
